new materials.sentence: Electrophilic substitution reactions with the corresponding N-halosuccinimides were used to synthesize all dihalogenated thiophene derivatives (Scheme S1, ESI†).

experimental methodology.sentence: KCTP involves two principal synthetic manipulations: (1) generation of the active monomer by a Grignard metathesis step;12 and (2) initiation and polymerization by application of the catalyst.

models.sentence: Electrophilic substitution reactions with the corresponding N-halosuccinimides were used to synthesize all dihalogenated thiophene derivatives (Scheme S1, ESI†).
